text:
Salaam saaab!
"Sheesha-e-dil ko tootne mt dena..usme hmara bhi aks chupa hai..."
don't think too much, just wrote this remembering your first ever shayari you told us in foyer...
Haann bhai shukla ji kaha se shuru kiya jaaye dekho imandaari se bola jaaye toh phle do saal me itni bonding ka mauka mila nhi......vo "Behanding in Spoken" k phle...vo bhai,,,by far the most fun play that I saw at IITK and being whatever you say....Assistant Director/or at least music guy, I enjoyed the practice sessions very much, Alan nair being alan nair........
uske baad third year coordisssssssss yeeeeeeee.....dram treat, mime madhu(ek din k baad dobara nhi aaya bhai tu), usko waapas bhejne ki mehnat....dewasheesh "sir"(deserving guy)...chipuku assistant jiski gandi nazre aapke professional partner varun pe...ostwal ki BT....Nana ka chutiyapa....aur orientation aate tk mai HC aur baaki sb BT me....
lekin ye toh kuch bhi nhi hai....
asli bt toh tb aayi jb tumhari kidney me patthar pade aur hamari fatt gyi(in sb k bich jad ko kuch gaaliyan banti hi hai, Y16 ka poora batch hi ch*tiya tha bhai, khair unki baat nhi karenge , panauti log)
uske baad tumne kaafin BT li, itni mt liya kr bhai......
.....Aur bhai, sach me itna ganda aadmi nhi hu yrr mai... Haan I admit, mai toxic hu, muffat hu, jo aata hai munh pe bol deta hu fir koi bhi ho senior, junior, batchmate ya bothra....but dil me nhi rakhta kuch......toh tu bhi BT mt liya kr is baat ki
2nd year antaragni ya poora saal hi kaafi BT wala rha hai...aur tumhare gaana hi usko portray krta hai, - "meri mehfil janaje si sajne lagi,"
Lekin 2nd year ki saari kasar agle saal poori ki hai.....fir chahe vo prelim disqualification se jeetne ka safar ho ya Y17 ch*tiya se Y17 fakr hai! tk ka safar aur isme tumhara contribution kon bhool sakta hai bhai.......

"Saath haare the, saath jeet gaye"

chalo ab ye saath toh yhi tk tha pr milenge fir kabhi aur fir kahi
I would like to apologise if I ever hurt you(even unintentionally)
Thanks for these countless memories.......

Best Wishes!
author: Rishabh  Katiyar

text:
chal bhai likhte hain memoir
apne paas toh bahaut maal hai(phoonkne wala nhi bhai, vo tere paas hona chahiye), likhne k liye.....
by far, the most talented guy I've ever met, saath me kaam kiya hai aur maze bhi bahut kiya hain, vo anant jain ki maarna ho ya bothra ki, 2nd year me dram trophy jeetna ho, ya third year me play direct krke 2nd position lana ho...tere  se sikhne k liye bahut kuch tha...acads se leke joint lsd tk but kuch sikh nhi paya iss baat ka thoda sa dukh rhega....abhi ek saal aur h saath me, hopefully kuch sikh lenge
Tu yrr h kuch alag 
mtlb kuch vo log hote hain na ki, jisko dekh k lgta hai ki ye role model hona chahiye,"Kaash mai iske jaisa bn paata", but at the same time you know ki tum nhi bn paoge
tu bilkul vaise hi hai.....
tere se vaise toh koi gila shikwa nhi rha hai hopefully
koi ho toh bhai uske liye sorry....
And, yeah Thanks for all those memories that we share, that galaxy nukkad, those songs, that S-TS pair, that play, that place where we used to practice , A2, F2, foyer, Antaragni days, that wasseypur scene,"aao ye aao bhaiya khela khel jaao bhaiya",that drameve 2 nukkad- "Jee ko coaching se paar karaya", "ek bagal me cult hoga, ek bagal me snt" And AAYE HAAYE.........

Best Wishes!
Faizal-Fazlu

text:
Yoooooooo lllllllllllamya,
kyuki hm log ek saal aur hai campus me (hopefully), toh mai soch rha tha ki abhi ye BT thodi defer krte hain aur abhi memoir nhi likhte hain, but ab kyuki tune likha(aur hgg diyağŸ¤ª) toh mai bhi kuch chije likhna chahunga,
Poora memoir toh teko dekh agle saal hi milega....abhi kuch likhne ki koshish krta hu, BT toh dekh already kaafi hai...
Point no. 1-> Meko saaf saaf yaad hai phli mulaqat..... Dram eve 2, 2nd day, tu foyer k left side wali jagah, jaha pe phone vagairah rakhte the, wha khadi thi and I noticed ki baaki sabko wha se observe kr rhi thi, even after being an introvert I approched you, I don't know why?(Actually, I know ğŸ¤ª), so I approached you and asked your name twice, kyuki "Ramya" I heard this name for the first time in my entire life, aur uske baad tune mera naam poocha toh meko samajh nhi aaya ki tu kya bol rhi because of you know, your telugu accent.....Haaan toh ye thi apni phli mulaqat.......definitely the very first friend I made at foyer,,, and at that time I did'nt even think that you'll hold such special place in my life.....
Point no. 2-> Aisi bahut si chije/baate/ghatnaaye hain jinke liye meko tujhe sorry bolna chahiye, kuch liye mai bol chuka hu.....aur baaki k liye abhi sorry bolna chahta hu........dil se.....
DAMN.....Abhi hi kaafi awkward sa ho rha hai toh baaki memoir abhi likhne ka idea drop krna is better decision......
Saath me Kaafi bakchodiyaan ki hain...Kaafi BTyan li hain...Kaafi bitching....Kaafi mehnat.....AUR...Kaafi adventures kiye hain.....
Aur fir abhi ek saal aur hain yha, college jaane ka mauka mila aur naana ko apni bandi, nipun ko apne bando aur (ab toh shyd tera bhi banda hai) toh teko fursat mili toh vo bakchodi k moments fir bana lenge...Trip toh pending hai hi

Aur baaki memoir mere pe à¤‰à¤§à¤¾à¤° rha tera.....Jb college se jaenge agle saal toh zarur likhunga....

text:
yaaseem ye tumhare aadmiyon ka kaam hai na...
haan bhai...
mai bhi aa gya yha
toh sabse phle I would say that I have always felt home around you.....
teko ye baat ho sakta hai sach na lage kyuki 2nd year k kuch tumhare aur hamare chutiyapo ki wajah se shyd rishta itna strong nhi rha hai, though I've always tried to talk to you kyuki you are one of the honest person I've ever met (not literally, but I could always see it in your eyes, vaise toh tu kaafi manipulative hai aur sach btata bhi nhi)
definitely among all HALL2 guys jinko aisa lgta tha ki hall 12 wale dominate kr lete hain hmko.....sed lyf
Never intentionally tried to do that...so I can't say anything to defend those allegations....
moving on.....(words somewhat close to loki)
firstyear summer ki baat kr lete hain......kya zeher kahani sunayi thi bhai tumne apsara-shrotriya-katiyar
usse bada zeher waapas se nhi dekha/suna
"sahebaan toh hm mudde pr aaye?"
aa jaate hain mudde pe....toh bhai sbse chaapu aur sbse zeher content ,agar kisi se sunne ko mila hai toh vo tum hi ho (ga*ima k crush) hamesha badi umra ki ldkiyan ki psnd aayi hain
aage badhte hue kaafi kharab mahol ho gya interIIT k bad se hi vo 'dominating' baato se aur fir toh tumne naata hi tod liya
I may be toxic but I try to be as honest I can, you can see what I'm thinking, in my actions, I'm saying all this because, "ye agar kabhi socha hai ki I'm pretending to be nice or something like that then thats not true", 
pta nhi upar kya likh diya maine chhod,
toh dindor ne tere se kaafi kuch sikhne ki koshish ki but tere se sirf zeher hi sikh paaya LOL
aur last k dino me kya ganda ignore kiya hai bhai tumne
itna ignore kon krte hain bhai
mtlb pakad pakad k baat krni pd rhi thi
chalo khush rhna uske saath (jo bhi ho I literally don't have any idea)

tere se hamesha "Home" vibes aati hain,
So I would like apologise for everything that you found hurtfull!
Thanks for making this journey great!

Best Wishes!
author: Rishabh  Katiyar

text:
"BHAI"
when I and Jai were there in that room (E608) we were thinking (wishing) that it would be great if nobody comes in this room but the next day in the afternoon you came and after that day definitely we never thought that thing again.
You are the textbook definition of CLARITY, CARE, CHAAPU, and "BHAI". I was definitely not good at my part (wasn't good enough as "BHAI" or "Roomie") but you were simply great .(just like in every other activity, you did) It always feels like home around you.
So,overall it was a great journey with you all.
bss ek closure ki kami rh gyi yrr...chalo fir milenge 
Thankyou "BHAI"

HI second year tk k sabse zimmedar Y17;

Phli Mulaqat....
Dram Eve 2 obv, isse zyada kuch yaad nhi, kuch memorable tha nhi shyd( vaise teko itna bhi yaad nhi hoga jitna likh rha huğŸ˜•, chill hai), Ek scene zarur banaya tha saath me, Raja Mantri wala aur life me phli aur akhiri baar aisa hua ki mera role nhi kata, tera kat gaya #BT #showoff
vaise play boi (I mean play guy) banne se phle bhai medley likhta tha("chanda mama so gye sooraj chachu jaage"), 4-liner bolta tha("...Phooti kismat janta ki jo koi saamne na aaya..."), aur toh aur choreo bhi krta tha("NANA de me chmtiya kta rha tha")ğŸ˜†
dram eve k baad shuru hota summer, "raat vo bhi ajab thi...raat vo bhi gazab thi...", phla gaana xD. 
Summer play toh ek line me hi summerize ho jaega,"aaj ka set plan ye hai"(zimmedari ki height)
cut to orientation nukkad jiske baad se ostwal "massom nhi stabdh" hi hai
fir shuru hoti hai dram eve 1- captain, "shanta tai kon karega?", "baki roles koi nhi karega kya?" END
(hamara nukkad chapa tha ğŸ˜)
Antaragni-BT hai, But ek chij jo mai mention krna chahunga is ostwal ka medley me contribution-"faggy se swaggy tk, mummy se daddy tk... hmne na maani sbki baat.. aa gyi 10vi k natije ki raat merit me naam aaye hain do bhannnat.." jo ki finally kat gya...koi nhi 
Play ka review de hi chuka hu teko alreadyğŸ¤ª
fir galaxy k time jb anchal se milne foyer bulaya tha tb wha pahunch k toh fatt hi gyi thi...
drameve 2 me interview vagiarh ki BT toh skip hi krte hain aur tere play ko bhiğŸ¤ª
baad me summer me saath me play padhna, team ikattha krna, cricket khelna, volley khelna,,, kaafi mazza aaya...and this was almost all... summer play k baad bhai jo tune marwaayi thi na.....khair...sara frustation play me tere upar nikalne ki koshish rhi hai but 70 minute me kya kya ho sakta hai...
Sath me play krna, jb prelim nhi kata uss time ki fati hui haalat me hansna, saath Antaragni jeetna.....accha lga
Okay so I obviously won't say that My college Life-You=0(You asked for this dindor. because, first I can't say that - definitely not your best half and second because I won't say that ğŸ˜)but definitely without you there would've been an irreplaceable void. You are among those first few people at IITK, whom I would have called "friends" and you have made this college life a lot better( and a lot more BTfull obviously). Sorry for all the jeers, some of them were definitely from the bottom of the heart(and, you deserved those) for the rest I'm sorry!
I've written all this in english kyuki hindi me likhta toh bt aa jaati.
-baki maine upar likha nhi but agar tere sath ki iss poori journey me jetti saath nhi hoti toh mai toh 
  nhi jhel paata ğŸ˜‘
-dramtreat me vo "26 hain hm, inko dekh lenge" wala discussion sahi tha LOL
-"fir milenge" likhne ka point nhi hai kyuki tu toh milega nhi kabhi
-Thank you for all the trust, Thank you for all the Memories that we share, Thank you for making My 
  college Life Better!
Here is One Final good bye!
Kai baar aisa lga hoga teko aur baaki sabko bhi ki, I hate you but it's not true!
"We are very similar yet the exact opposite(Kalidas aur Vilom yaad hai)"
Chalo bhai, "Best Wishes!"
(Agar poora padha hai toh visible krne se phle ek baar soch le, & Sorry for making your College Life diificult)
author: Rishabh  Katiyar

text:
Ooooo Bhai............
last din h aur abhi tk memoir nhi likha??????lgta hai nightout pdega,,,nightout pdega
haan bhai toh bakchodi k liye club k bahar kaafi famous hai nana aur club k andar chutiyape k liye kaafi famous hai.....y15 ka ladla.....y16 ko jalane wala....aur y17 ko hansane wala
Nana toh yha aate hi nana ho gya tha aur tb se nana hi hai.....
vaise hmne kaafi samay saath bitaya hai......unless tu fraud maar rha ho ya mai BT me chitral se baat rha hu LOL
saath me kaam bhi kaafi sahi kiye hain.....fir chahe vo 2nd year ki medley k gaane ho.....ya uss kavvali ka choreo......ya fir "aur ye toota dil" aaye haaye............
(iska credit chori nhi hona chahiye)ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£
tere saath safar bhi lamba rha hai,,,play k logo se alag roz foyer me first year k saath kuch kuch krte hue baaki logo ka wait aur thodi bahut bakaiti mai tu aur rochak....
(uss din kedia ne kuch bola toh Rochak k gusse me tera bhi kat gya,,,bahut chakkar lagaye foyer k)
vaise tere se honest log km hi milte hain, aur isi wajah se apne bich honest discussions bhi kaafi hue hain,,,aur tu generally meko kaafi acche se samajh leta hai(confession?)
(vaise bhai sach bta rha hu kuch date vate nhi chal rhe the kabhi pooore 4 saal meğŸ˜†)
bt handling ek skill hai......jisme mai obv bilkul kharab hu.......but tu pro hai bhai
coordi tenure me bt aane pe pareshaan hone ki jagah hansna sikh liya bhai, yaad h kai baar bt aane pe zor zor se hanste the
ye skill sikhane k liye toh bhai bahut saare dhanyawad deserve krta h tu, pr bolunga nhi...kyu?
kyuki...
..
.
tune kaata bhi bahut hai...vo ccd wala kissa ek instance hi hai but tera kaata... kaata nhi lgta(wholesome vibes) 
aakhiri k kuch dino me tera cooler theek kiya tha maine aur varun ne, mauka mila toh usi k hava me bahut nightouts maarne hain, music k saath pr tu swarg movie k gaane bajaega khair....
tu table bajana sahi maza aaega.....

abhi tk aisa lga hai ki sb change ho jaye toh bhi nana change nhi ho sakta, isko continue rakh bhai
change ka scope hai but abhi chill hai......chill maar coding kr aur, hm sabko mze aate rhne chahiye, acche se krna.jpeg

baaki placements k liye chaaro ka sath toh hai hi

ye sawaal kai logo se poocha hai tujhse bhi poochna hi pdega...placements k baad teko fursat milegi??? apne grahsth jiwan or if I ask this in Rochak k tarike se 'apni joru ki gulami krte"
fursat mile agar tum teeno ko apne bandi/bande/bando(nipun k ) se toh karenge fir se sb kuch nukkad aur play se camping rafting tk,,,ramaiya pe khane se lekar chandni chowk k parathe aur momos tk.,..chowpatty k sweet corn se mumbai k beech tk
dram room se c408 tk
zindgi k saath se zindgi k baad tk(rhyming me tha isliye isko bhi likh diya,seriously mt le ye vaade rochak ostwal k liye rhne dete hain ğŸ˜¬ğŸ˜¬ğŸ˜‰)

ek baat bta?
wha se punjab dikh rha hai? baaki chill maar aise taane tu rochak ko marne hi lga hai aur sikh jaega
vo choreo ka thikra mere pe mt phod vo ostwal ka idea tha
tu hamesha hi sabke liye stress buster rha hai, bt h? abhi theek krke deta hu
iss baar time pe aa jaana
nhi toh fir se meko hi attention milegi saari

text:
group me se thoda sa chidkr aage badhte hue 
"...le KT chal...(thoda aage badhkr rukte hue...) aee chal na yrrr...(iske baad bhi jb KT apni jagah pe muskura rha hai...) kya kr rha KT, oyee chalo na yrr...kya karega yha ruk kr...(waapas aate hue)"

So, "Dindor" k iss IITK me se unn hazaro fans me se ek mai, but I'm a special fan, I can't give a reason why, but I'M SPECIAL FAN! That's how things have always been for me, that's how I'M, if I believe in something/someone I don't need a reason for that!(who knows it better than Dindor)
But, Just Like every other fan I'm also here to write something..... Actually, it's difficult to sum-up(trivial dialougue) but I'll give it a shot!

Vaise Dindor k baare me accha toh sb likhenge kyuki - phla , "Dindor college ki vo ladki jaisa h, jispe poora college fida hai, pr dindor already apna dil kisi "LOLU" ko de chuka hai, pr sadly "LOLU" ne bhi use friendzone kr rkha hai"(saad asfaq) doosra-"dindor sbko ishwar k karib le jata hai"
toh mai "special" fan hona justify krte hue kuch "tarif" kr hi deta hu
BT me mera naam sabse upar aata hai but ye, ye khud toh BT leta hi h saath hi BT ka mahol banane me bhi saksham hai(hm log k saath bithoor nhi gya ganga k paas, BT k chakkar me)
Volley khelte time chid jata hai,(confession: isko on purpose chidate the, maza aata tha)
fat ti bahut jaldi hai mtlb Kaagaj se bhi jaldi fatne wali duniya me ek hi chij hai (Instance: abhi hall 12 me ghusne me pasina aa jaata tha)
Chalo ab thoda Nostalgic baate- Antaragni'18 foyer me sirf mai, tu, nana (baaki sb "CAST") aur hm yha exercise, Medley, scenes bana rhe (first years k sath vo bhi) DAMN!
Rendezvous k phle 2-3 acche gujre Virgin Mohito peete hue,BHIM k khyali pulaav k maze lete hue fir(Bamboo ki disha mudti hui...) fir kuch samay k liye mere sath kaafi sautela vyavhar hua(reason UNKNOWN ğŸ˜œğŸ¤ª) Dindor ab Team BOT ka hissa tha,...

BHAI Once asked me(when I was planning for a movie)-,"mai nhi ja rha tu dekh teko jana hai ya hamare saath rukna hai", and......dindor ne 4 saal meko jhela h!

Third year, we both kinda "rejected" and "dejected" guys took the command of a new mission, "Mission MIME" and rest is History!(Self-Appreciation 100)
--BT skip--
I know I was hurtful in last few days of our college life, sometimes because "Tum kaafi ignore kr rhe the hmko", I guess you can forgive me for those jeers and if you can't, doesn't matter ğŸ˜ğŸ˜

Well, our " journey together " and this memoir both are heading towards a halt, so I would like to say, I may not be that special fan ğŸ˜„, but you've always been special for me, So...
Thanks.....Thanks for all the memories that we share, Thanks for all the life lessons, Thanks for the day when you asked 'HUM ya VO', Thanks for always STANDING BY ME â¤â¤
THANKS for making this college life a lot better!
Bhai jb tu ja rha tha toh gale milne ka bada mann tha, BUT mai fatt jata(shyd tu bhi)

Cringe se Cringebuster bnte hue dekha hai dindor ko, "RocHak" hua krta tha bhai pr ab DINDOR h

adieu DINDOR "BOT"SON
This is Hard!
-ashiqKT
author: Rishabh  Katiyar

text:
Hi Suppu,
HALL 12 k dominance ka shikaar banda, bhai ek baar fir se bolunga ki,......"nhiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii bhai, aise intentionally ya unintentionally bhi ktry nhi kiya"
Well, I'll blame bothra for all this "zeher", and chitral for causing it!(typing katiyar, right?)
toh chalo bhai shuru krte hain Drameve 1 yaad hai? nhi yaad hoga kyuki maine dram eve 1 me kuch yaad rakhne layak try bhi nhi kiya tha bss jaldi se jaldi uss foyer se nikal k dobara kabhi nhi aane ka mann bana liya tha
One of the most enthusiastic guy jo apni marzi se dram k liye dram kr rha tha, I've seen very few guys like you even after doing it for 3-4 years, jb baat aati hai antaragni prelim se bahar hokar antaragni jitne tk ki, tera contribution nhi bhula ja sakta, hmne saath me BT toh share nhi kari hai, but I would have loved to do that(typical katiyar, right?) shukla k kidney me patthar aate hi hm sabki fatt gyi thi but uss time tumne aake hme kaafi bacha liya
AND, 
Drameve 1 jo hmne ki.....usme kat gya.....(koi baat nhi)////well...I was there ğŸ˜
Drameve 1 jo hmne krwaayi uska TS....SARLAAAAAAAA....Haan yrr ye toh mai hi hu..../////ahem ahem "Captain"ğŸ¤ª
Drameve 1 jb hm third year the.....Arre jaake gaddhi khodo gaddhi.........//////yeah.....I was there..ğŸ˜ƒ
Drameve 2-"Behanding in Spoken"////// Assistant Director/Music guy -katiyarğŸ˜
Suppu------The man of DramEves! (And, I was there everytime with you, you wouldn't have noticed it though)
Antaragni toh ek yaad rakhne layak nhi haiğŸ˜¶
aur doosri yaad krne ki zarurat nhi.....(But tere contribution k bina jeetna possible nhi hota bhai)ğŸ–¤
Well I would like to apologise, if I ever hurt your feelings(even unintentionally)
And Thanks for millions of sweet and bitter memories that we share.........

Best Wishes, Physicist!
Most Sheldon'ish guy I have ever met in real life, Hence hard to understand!
author: Rishabh  Katiyar

text:
TAKE: 999999999


".......Heyyyyyyyyyyyyyy......jama hue sb bhai bahen sb jaccha baccha kaccha log.....muft jaanch ka mauka hai aur haath me sabke sasta rog.....faad k dhapli nikla naag, tod k machis faili aag......aag lagegi jungle me toh jal jaega vo mendhak jo kue me baitha bach jaane ka mauka dega choooooook....lo aa gyi..lo aa gyi....lo aa gyi IIT Kanpur ki fursat mandli leke nukkad natak............."


Sath to qayamat se qayamat tk raha bhai...kya kya likha jaaye.....khair BT na dene ki poori koshish krte hue kuch yaadein taaza krne ki kawayad shuru krte hain.....
Top-Down approch ğŸ¤ª
Aakhiri k kuch din: mazedaar,  kuch coding nights, kuch movie nights, din ki kon si do meals chahiye , kuch lal peele jokes, kuch punjab nana jokes, kuch evergreen acting ashiq gymfreak dietchart specialist Nipun jokes, Last me mugshot aur fir achanak se college life khtam.....but ye last k mahine me maze kaafi kiye.....maggi ki kettle kon dhoega? chal A2, pani bharke laate h, "Kyu beta nahaoge kya?"
iss baat ko toh mai nhi nakaar sakta ki maine bahut BT li hai, pr bhai tune hr bar sambhala hai.....
khair ek sacche jain aaye the aur saache hi ja rhe ho-"bina maans-madira ka sevan kiye"-Respect!

First year galaxy me saath shuru hua tha, tere jaise km hi log the jo bina kisi k pressure k apne marzi se lagatar club aaye..........galaxy k baad jo saath shuru hua vo fir chalta hi gya....drameve 2 ho, summer ya drameve1(apni wali) bss intro na le paane aur reporter na kr paane ka malaal hai....uske baad antaragni....sath me pehla gaana.....fir sath me Antaragni ki BT.....jo ki 3-4 din chali...aankho me gussa liye kale kurte me ghoomte kuch yuva aise lg rhe the... maano.......kaluaaa ki gang sadko pr utar aayi ho,
guthri govan(Or, whatever the correct spelling is)k show k time musical BT......
uske baad InterIIT k time tsp ka craze,"Hi Mowgley"-Ohh Aaaaaap se kah rhe hain......"40-40 take lete hain...."fir standup debut-Chapa tha bhai!
GALAXY 2nd year-golden time EBSB ho ya nukkad......result dram trophy winner for the second time....
BT phase part-2.......coordi interviews......vo nukkad (hulkmeme.jpg)
Third year ki baat nhi karunga bhai vo sb toh hamesha yaad rahega hi.....jitni BTyan hain ya acche pal hain sb!
Iss poori journey me Rochak ho, ya Nana, aur ye dono nhi toh NIPUN hi sahi maari toh sabki kafi hai hmne....jiske liye gaaliyaan bhi kaafi mili hainğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£
All those musical nights bhai, tere saath sync me gaana gaake maza hi aa jaata tha.....MAJOR MISSING
bothra ko thappad imagine krke hi maza aa jaata hai.....kisi ne kaha tha ki, varun jain accha performer nhi hai....you proved them wrong......
bhai agar tu nhi hota toh mai third year play ka role kabhi pull off nhi kr paata.....tu jitna support krta rha hai meko, usiki wajah se mai itna confidence la paaya tha ki vo play perform kr saku.....
tere se bahut kuch sikha hai, fir vo chahe nukkad se related ho ya zindagi se....
So, I would like to say "THANKS" for..........for always standing by me......for always supporting me........for giving me the confidence to pulloff anything......for staying with me when I was in BT(so alwaysğŸ˜).......for helping me in getting though it.....ANDDD.......for wiping out my puke(both metaphorically and literallyğŸ¤ª)
I literally had tears in my eyes, when I was leaving the campus.......THANKS for making this journey worth those tears......
Arre yrr BT ho gyi kya?,"hm yha 10 saal se kaam kr rhe hain, aaj hm ro diye", khair "Vo toh bhai tumara motapa bta rha hai" ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
...foyer...dram rooom......ramaiya.....hall2....hall12.....volleyball.....MT k pakode.....Musical Nights....Movie nights....BT sessions.....Chowpatty pe 3 baje ki chai.....dj khaled moments ft. NANA....OAT ki vo seedhiya jaha BT me roye aur khushi me celebrate kiya.....Galaxy ki raatein jb kuch bhi krne ko taiyar rhte the.....vo moments jb sirf mai nhi, mere saath tu bhi roya......InterIIT trips.....

ye aur iske jaisi bahut saari chije ab pichhe chhoot rhi hain.....haan hm log abhi hain yha, Nana ko uski bandi aur nipun ko uske bando se fursat mili toh jaenge in jagaho pe......pr jaha bhi jaenge tum logo ko bada miss karenge yrrğŸ–¤

Aur fir kabhi jb milenge kahi bhi, kabhi bhi toh ye sb yaadein bhi samet lenge, offline na sahi online hi sahi, aur koi nhi toh mai, tu aur nipun toh aa hi jaenge.....

Tum ko bye bolte gala thoda geela ho rha hai.....
"lalllllllllllllllllll, peeeeela ho rha haiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii"........(sounded fun in my mindğŸ¤ª)

Some words for you: "ye jo chanchal sa baalak hai, ye toh dil ka saccha hai"
Confession(kind'of): I never found you dominating!
author: Rishabh  Katiyar
